name: A mixture of peroxyacetic acid
hydrogen peroxide
1-diphosphonic acid
FoodContactSubstance: A mixture of peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid, (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), and 1-hydroxyethylidine-1,1-diphosphonic acid (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), and water. REPLACES FCN 1081 and FCN 1082
